parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port of the cloud service that is added to WAF.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The type of the protocol. Valid values:

*   **http**
*   **https**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceProduct
parameters.description:
The cloud service. Valid values:

*   **clb4**: Layer 4 CLB.
*   **clb7**: Layer 7 CLB.
*   **ecs**: ECS.
